attributes.action: Take action on soft Judges, and if there is not enough room in prison, build a some more!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Why do different Judges give completely different sentences for the same crime?
I know there are guidelines for punishment, but these are very lenient and not “black and white” enough.
Why do you issue “community service” instead of locking criminals up?
This obviously does not work!
If the issue is “lack of room in prison” then build some more, this would stop lots of crime, create jobs and sort this country out.
